name: Ctrl Alt Defeat!
description:
Synopsis

Its Frank's first day on the job as a data porter and to this byte-sized worker, delivering data from Joe's Computer to the USB sounds like an easy number. Nevertheless, chaos ensues when Frank runs into more trouble than he bargained for. Do YOU have what it takes to grab the Energy Blaster and help Frank fend off the toxic Viruses? The fate of the computer rests in your hands!

“Ctrl Art Defeat!” is a first-person shooter with a focus on narrative. The game explores the world inside of a computer and takes the player on a journey through the machine’s components, transferring data from one location to another along the way. Interactive pick-ups, challenging enemies, quirky characters and a hand-crafted environment creates an immersive experience for the player.

Controls

W, A, S, D = Movement

Spacebar = Jump

Hold Shift = Run

Mouse Position = Camera Direction

Left Mouse Click = Shoot Blaster

E = Interact

Developers
  • Kevin McEnroe
  • Luke Reynor
  • Christian Toner
